content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえいえ。私も、ちゃんと勉強したというより、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, no. Rather than having properly studied,"},{"lineNumber":1982,"originalJapaneseLine":"　実地でやってきた体験を活かしてるだけですし」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m just making use of the experience I gained hands-on.\""},{"lineNumber":1983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……というか、赤ちゃんって","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Or rather, with babies,"},{"lineNumber":1984,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほとんど面倒見た事無いので……","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve barely taken care of them before..."},{"lineNumber":1985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんな基本的には丈夫で、助かってます」","translatedEnglishLine":"Basically, they’re all quite healthy, so it’s been a relief.\""},{"lineNumber":1986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは私も同感だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I agree with that.\""},{"lineNumber":1987,"originalJapaneseLine":"くすりと、二人は笑みを交わす。","translatedEnglishLine":"They shared a small smile."},{"lineNumber":1988,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっと、もう行かなくちゃ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I have to get going now."},{"lineNumber":1989,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次の約束があるんだった」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have an appointment next.\""},{"lineNumber":1990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っと、おっとととと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oops, whoa there.\""},{"lineNumber":1991,"originalJapaneseLine":"立ち上がった拍子に、","translatedEnglishLine":"As she stood up suddenly,"},{"lineNumber":1992,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリは足元をふらつかせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol stumbled at her feet."},{"lineNumber":1993,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you okay?\""},{"lineNumber":1994,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":1995,"originalJapaneseLine":"千姫がふわりと抱きとめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chihime gently caught her."},{"lineNumber":1996,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……少し熱があるんじゃないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Do you have a slight fever?\""},{"lineNumber":1997,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………いえいえいえ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... no, no, no.\""},{"lineNumber":1998,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリは笑顔で、千姫の腕から抜け出て、","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol smiled and slipped out of Chihime's arms,"},{"lineNumber":1999,"originalJapaneseLine":"体勢を立て直した。","translatedEnglishLine":"regaining her balance."},{"lineNumber":2000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さすがにちょっと、疲れてるみたいですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I guess I am a little tired."},{"lineNumber":2001,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも大丈夫ですよ。病気じゃないです」","translatedEnglishLine":"But it’s alright. I'm not sick.\""},{"lineNumber":2002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうなのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":2003,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。病気の感じ方は、身に染みてますから。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. I know what being ill feels like from experience."},{"lineNumber":2004,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それと違うのは分かります」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can tell when it's different.\""},{"lineNumber":2005,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういえば……長患いをしていたのだったか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come to think of it... you had a long illness before.\""},{"lineNumber":2006,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。でも今は大丈夫ですけどね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. But I’m okay now."},{"lineNumber":2007,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さて、では改めて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, let’s start again...\""},{"lineNumber":2008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「忙しいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Busy, aren’t you?\""},{"lineNumber":2009,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人が増えましたからね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because more people have joined."},{"lineNumber":2010,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃ、頑張ってきまーす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, I’ll do my best!\""},{"lineNumber":2011,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリは一度、腕に力こぶを作ってから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol made a muscle with her arm once,"},{"lineNumber":2012,"originalJapaneseLine":"たったかと出て行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and then quickly went out."},{"lineNumber":2013,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……元気な娘だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What a lively girl.\""},{"lineNumber":2014,"originalJapaneseLine":"――――だが。","translatedEnglishLine":"――――But."},{"lineNumber":2015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………あれ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... huh...?\""},{"lineNumber":2016,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリの視界が揺らぐ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol’s vision wavered."},{"lineNumber":2017,"originalJapaneseLine":"身体が思うように動かない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Her body wouldn’t move as she wanted."},{"lineNumber":2018,"originalJapaneseLine":"頭が働かない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Her mind wasn’t functioning."},{"lineNumber":2019,"originalJapaneseLine":"（へ、へんだよ……これ……あ、あれ、っ……？","translatedEnglishLine":"(Th-this is strange... this... wha, what...?"},{"lineNumber":2020,"originalJapaneseLine":"　発作の時は、もっと………………）","translatedEnglishLine":"During my seizures, it’s always been more...)"},{"lineNumber":2021,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――――あ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"――――oh."},{"lineNumber":2022,"originalJapaneseLine":"茫洋とした頭の片隅で、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the corner of her hazy mind,"},{"lineNumber":2023,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひとつの事に思い至ったのを意識して……","translatedEnglishLine":"she was aware of coming to one realization..."},{"lineNumber":2024,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリは、意識を失った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol lost consciousness."},{"lineNumber":2025,"originalJapaneseLine":"「キャロリが倒れただとーーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Carol collapsed―――!?"},{"lineNumber":2026,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、しーっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance, shh!"},{"lineNumber":2027,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……ただの風邪だよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...It’s just a cold.\""},{"lineNumber":2028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「間違いないのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you sure about that?"},{"lineNumber":2029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか妙な病気とか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be some strange disease...?"},{"lineNumber":2030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アイム薬屋！　間違いないよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m the pharmacist! It’s definitely not."},{"lineNumber":2031,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とりあえず、薬は飲ませといたから」","translatedEnglishLine":"For now, I’ve given her medicine.\""},{"lineNumber":2032,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう……まあよかろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... Well, fine.\""},{"lineNumber":2033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん…………ぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm... ah...\""},{"lineNumber":2034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、目が覚めた？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, you’re awake?\""},{"lineNumber":2035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you okay?\""},{"lineNumber":2036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あはは……すみません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ahaha... Sorry."},{"lineNumber":2037,"originalJapaneseLine":"　医者の不養生ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"The doctor neglecting her own health...\""},{"lineNumber":2038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、大丈夫ならいいが。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, it’s fine if you’re okay."},{"lineNumber":2039,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無理するんじゃないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t overdo it.\""},{"lineNumber":2040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやー……考えてみたら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah... come to think of it,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえいえ。私も、ちゃんと勉強したというより、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, no. Rather than having properly studied,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実地でやってきた体験を活かしてるだけですし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m just making use of the experience I gained hands-on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど面倒見た事無いので……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve barely taken care of them before...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな基本的には丈夫で、助かってます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, they’re all quite healthy, so it’s been a relief."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くすりと、二人は笑みを交わす。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I have to get going now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の約束があるんだった」
キャロリは足元をふらつかせた。
千姫がふわりと抱きとめる。
「……少し熱があるんじゃないか？」
キャロリは笑顔で、千姫の腕から抜け出て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carol smiled and slipped out of Chihime's arms,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さすがにちょっと、疲れてるみたいですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I guess I am a little tired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも大丈夫ですよ。病気じゃないです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it’s alright. I'm not sick."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。病気の感じ方は、身に染みてますから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. I know what being ill feels like from experience.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それと違うのは分かります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can tell when it's different."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば……長患いをしていたのだったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come to think of it... you had a long illness before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。でも今は大丈夫ですけどね。
じゃ、頑張ってきまーす！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, I’ll do my best!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリは一度、腕に力こぶを作ってから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carol made a muscle with her arm once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たったかと出て行った。
キャロリの視界が揺らぐ。
身体が思うように動かない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her body wouldn’t move as she wanted.
During my seizures, it’s always been more...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 茫洋とした頭の片隅で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the corner of her hazy mind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつの事に思い至ったのを意識して……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was aware of coming to one realization...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリは、意識を失った。
「キャロリが倒れただとーーーー！？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be some strange disease...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アイム薬屋！　間違いないよ。
とりあえず、薬は飲ませといたから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For now, I’ve given her medicine."
The doctor neglecting her own health..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理するんじゃないぞ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえいえ。私も、ちゃんと勉強したというより、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, no. Rather than having properly studied,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実地でやってきた体験を活かしてるだけですし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m just making use of the experience I gained hands-on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど面倒見た事無いので……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve barely taken care of them before...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな基本的には丈夫で、助かってます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, they’re all quite healthy, so it’s been a relief."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くすりと、二人は笑みを交わす。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I have to get going now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の約束があるんだった」
キャロリは足元をふらつかせた。
千姫がふわりと抱きとめる。
「……少し熱があるんじゃないか？」
キャロリは笑顔で、千姫の腕から抜け出て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carol smiled and slipped out of Chihime's arms,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さすがにちょっと、疲れてるみたいですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I guess I am a little tired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも大丈夫ですよ。病気じゃないです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it’s alright. I'm not sick."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。病気の感じ方は、身に染みてますから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. I know what being ill feels like from experience.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それと違うのは分かります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can tell when it's different."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば……長患いをしていたのだったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come to think of it... you had a long illness before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。でも今は大丈夫ですけどね。
じゃ、頑張ってきまーす！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, I’ll do my best!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリは一度、腕に力こぶを作ってから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carol made a muscle with her arm once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たったかと出て行った。
キャロリの視界が揺らぐ。
身体が思うように動かない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her body wouldn’t move as she wanted.
During my seizures, it’s always been more...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 茫洋とした頭の片隅で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the corner of her hazy mind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつの事に思い至ったのを意識して……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was aware of coming to one realization...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリは、意識を失った。
「キャロリが倒れただとーーーー！？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be some strange disease...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アイム薬屋！　間違いないよ。
とりあえず、薬は飲ませといたから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For now, I’ve given her medicine."
The doctor neglecting her own health..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理するんじゃないぞ」
